Verses: 1 dharisanap Pallaththaakkin Baaram. Unnil Ullavargal Ellaarum Veedugalinmel Eruvadharku Unakku Ippozhudhu Vandhadhu Enna?
2 sandhadigalaal Niraindhu Aaravaarampanni, Kalikoorndhirundha Nagarame, Unnidaththil Kolaiyundavargal Pattayaththaal Kolaiyundadhillai, Yuththaththil Seththadhum Illai.
3 un Adhipadhigal Ellaarum Egamaai Odi Alaindhum, Vilveeraraal Kattappadugiraargal; Unnil Adappatta Yaavarum Dhooraththukku Odiyum Egamaaik Kattappadugiraargal.
4 aagaiyaal, Ennai Nokkip Paaraadheyungal; En Janamaagiya Kumaaraththi Paazhaaipponadhinimiththam Manankasandhu Azhuven; Enakku Aarudhal Solla Varaadheyungal Engiren.

5 senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavaraale Idhu Dharisanap Pallaththaakkile Amaliyum, Midhiyungudhalum, Kalakkamumulla Naalaayirukkiradhu, Idhu Alangaththaith Thagarththu, Parvadhaththukku Nere Aarpparikkum Naalaayirukkiradhu.
6 elaamiyan Ambaraaththooniyai Eduththu, Radhangalodum Kaalaatkalodum Kudhiraiveerarodum Varugiraan; Keer Kedagaththai Velippaduththum.
7 magaa Vadivaana Un Pallaththaakkugal Radhangalaal Nirappappadum; Kudhiraiveerar Vaasalgal Mattum Vandhu Anivaguththu Nirpaargal.
8 avan Yoodhaavin Maraivai Neekkippoduvaan; Annaalile Vanamaaligaiyaagiya Aayudhasaalaiyai Nokkuvaai.
9 neengal Dhaaveedhu Nagaraththin Ididhalgal Anegamaayiruppadhaik Kandu Keezhkkulaththuth Thanneergalaik Kattivaiththu,
10 erusalemin Veedugalai Enni, Alangaththai Aranippaakkumpadi Veedugalai Idiththu,

11 irandu Madhilgalukku Naduve Pazhaiya Kulaththuth Thanneergalukku Oru Agazhai Undupannuveergal; Aanaalum Adhai Seydhavarai Neengal Nokkaamalum, Adhai Erpaduththi Dhooraththilirundhu Varappanninavaraik Gavaniyaamalum Pogireergal.
12 senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Akkaalaththile Azhavum, Pulambavum, Mottaiyidavum Rattuduththavum Kattalaiyittaar.
13 neengalo, Sandhoshiththukkaliththu, Aadumaadugalai Adiththu, Iraichchiyai Saappittu, Dhraatcharasaththaik Kudiththu: Pusippom Kudippom, Naalaikku Saavom Endru Solveergal.

14 meyyaagave Neengal Saagumattum Indha Akkiramam Ungalukku Nivirththiyaavadhillai Endru Senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraarenbadhu En Sevi Ketkumpadi Senaigalin Karththaraal Therivikkappattadhu.
15 senaigalin Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraiththadhaavadhu: Nee Aramanai Visaarippukkaaranum Pokkishakkaaranumaagiya Sepnaa Enbavanidaththil Poi Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal,

16 uyarndha Sthalaththile Than Kallaraiyai Vetti, Kanmalaiyile Thanakku Vaasasthalaththaith Thondugiravanaippola, Nee Unakku Inge Kallaraiyai Vettumpadikku Unakku Inge Enna Irukkiradhu? Unakku Inge Yaar Irukkiraargal?
17 idho, Belavaan Oruvanaith Thuraththugiravannamaagak Karththar Unnaith Thuraththivittu, Nichchayamaai Unnai Moodippoduvaar.
18 avar Unnai Urundaiyaippola Agalamum Visaalamumaana Dhesaththile Suzhatri Erindhuviduvaar; Ange Nee Saavaai, Ange Un Magimaiyin Radhangal Un Aandavanudaiya Veettukku Igazhchchiyaaga Irukkum.
19 unnai Un Nilaiyaivittuth Thuraththividuven; Un Sthaanaththilirundhu Nee Pidungippodappaduvaai.
20 annaalile Lakkiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Eliyaakkeem Ennum En Oozhiyakkaaranai Naan Azhaiththu:
21 un Vasthiraththai Avanukkuth Thariththu, Un Kachchaiyaal Avanai Idaikkatti, Un Adhigaaraththai Avan Kaiyile Koduppen; Avan Erusalemin Kudigalukkum Yoodhaavin Vamsaththukkum Thagappanaayiruppaan.
22 dhaaveedhudaiya Veettin Thiravukolai Avan Tholinmel Vaippen; Oruvarum Poottak Koodaadhapadikku Avan Thirappaan. Oruvarum Thirakkak Koodaadhapadikku Avan Poottuvaan.
23 avanai Urudhiyaana Idaththile Aaniyaagak Kadaavuven; Avan Than Thagappan Veettukku Magimaiyaana Singaasanamaaga Iruppaan.
24 adhinmel Avan Thagappan Vamsaththaaraagiya Puththirar Powththirarudaiya Magimai Anaiththaiyum Siridhum Peridhumaana Sagala Paanapaaththirangalaiyum Thookkivaippargal.

25 urudhiyaana Idaththil Kadaavappattirundha Aani Annaalile Pidungappattu, Murindhuvizhum; Appozhudhu Adhinmel Thongina Baaram Arundhuvizhum Endru Senaigalin Karththar Uraikkiraar; Karththare Idhai Uraikkiraar Endru Sol Endraar.
